introduce.description: Text Tier List Maker is a specialized free online tool that helps you create tier lists using text entries instead of images. Perfect for quick rankings, opinions, and organizing ideas without needing images.

items.title: Completely Free Text Tier List Maker

items.title: No Images Required
items.description: Unlike traditional tier list makers, our Text Tier List Maker doesn't require images. Just type text entries to create professional-looking tier lists instantly.

items.description: The simplest tier list maker available. Type, press Enter, drag to organize, and download. Create tier lists in seconds with Text Tier List Maker.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Create a Text Tier List
usage.description: Creating a text tier list is incredibly simple with our Text Tier List Maker. Follow these easy steps:

items.title: Step 1: Enter Text
items.description: Type your text in the input field (up to 50 characters) and press Enter or click 'Add Text'. Your entry will be added to the D tier automatically.

items.title: Step 2: Organize by Tiers
items.description: On desktop: drag and drop text items between tiers (S, A, B, C, D). On mobile: tap items to open the quick menu and select the target tier.

items.title: Step 3: Edit Your List
items.description: Hover over items to see the delete button (X icon) and remove unwanted entries. Add more text items or reorganize as needed.

items.title: Step 4: Save and Share
items.description: Click 'Save Image' to download your text tier list as a high-quality PNG image. Share your rankings anywhere instantly!

items.title: Auto-Save Feature
items.description: Your text tier list is automatically saved in your browser. Close the tab and return later - your progress is preserved.

items.title: Quick Export Options

items.title: Mobile-Friendly Design
items.description: Use our Text Tier List Maker on any device. Create and edit text tier lists on desktop, tablet, or mobile seamlessly.

items.title: No Registration Required
items.description: Start using our Text Tier List Maker immediately. No account needed - just open and create your text tier list.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Text Tier List Maker
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.

items.title: What is a Text Tier List Maker?
items.description: A Text Tier List Maker is a free online tool that allows you to create tier lists using text entries instead of images. Simply type text, press Enter, and organize your entries into tiers (S, A, B, C, D).

items.title: Is this Text Tier List Maker really free?
items.description: Yes! Our Text Tier List Maker is 100% free to use. You can create unlimited text-based tier lists, organize them, and download your rankings without any cost or subscription.

items.title: Do I need images to use Text Tier List Maker?
items.description: No! That's the beauty of Text Tier List Maker - you don't need any images. Just type your text entries and create tier lists instantly. Perfect for opinions, ideas, or anything without images.

items.title: How do I create a text tier list?
items.description: Using our Text Tier List Maker is simple: 1) Type your text in the input field, 2) Press Enter or click 'Add Text', 3) Drag and drop text items into tiers, 4) Click 'Save Image' to download.

items.title: Can I save my text tier list progress?
items.description: Yes! Our Text Tier List Maker automatically saves your progress in your browser's local storage. You can close the page and return later to continue working.

items.title: How do I share my text tier list?
items.description: After creating your text tier list, click 'Save Image' to download it as a high-quality PNG. You can then share this image on social media, forums, or anywhere you like.
